meta.title: Configuration production settings
meta.description: Before deploying your django back-end in production you need to configure it for safety and performance. A checklist such as https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/3.1/howto/deployment/checklist/ will be configure for your django project.

Input_data.description: Django settings file, where all the important attributes must be defined
Input_data.QA: A good settings file do not have hard coded values such as secret keys.

Output_data.description: Django settings file, where all the important attributes are properly defined according to the https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/3.1/howto/deployment/checklist/ and are not hard coded.
All the attribute value defined in the django settings file must be defined in a separate file. This is a example of the file.
